DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_1: All the fires must be lit. It will try to stop you.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_2: Light the fire. Go to the observatory, you'll be safe there.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_TH_NOTE_3: Do not let it catch you. It could be anywhere.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_CT_NOTE_1: I left a trail of lanterns
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_CT_NOTE_2: Light the fire and come, quickly
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_1: Hey it's me Ernesto, the magic talking anglerfish!
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_2: You eating some weird marshmallows or what.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_DB_3: Lay off the sap wine, hatchling.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_AG_1: What an unfortunate universe to exist in.
DialogueDictionary.DREAMSTALKER_POPUP: Thank you for installing Dreamstalker! This should only be played after beating the main game and DLC. Something is different in the solar system, search for notes to find answers.
